decks.name: React component
decks.description: React Router is a collection of navigational components that compose declaratively with your applications and components.

cards.front:
What path will match the follow Route?
<Route>
  <NotFound />
</Route>
cards.back: All paths. A route with no path matches all URL's

cards.front: How to use a link in react
What tag replace if statement in REACT
